text: Ese ntujya ubona ko Allah yamanuye amazi mu kirere maze akayinjiza mu butaka, hanyuma akaba amasoko nuko akayameresha ibihingwa by’amabara atandukanye, hanyuma bikuma ukabona bibaye umuhondo; nuko (byamara kumagara) akabihindura utuvungukira? Mu by’ukuri muri ibyo hari urwibutso ku banyabwenge
